medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple painful benign nerve sheath tumors.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 15-year history of symptoms tentatively diagnosed as NF1 or schwannomatosis. She has numerous soft-tissue masses causing local tenderness and distal neuropathic pain. Pain has been particularly severe in the bilateral retromastoid scalp masses, which prevented her from sleeping.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous tumor excisions in 2001, 2002, and 2005, including left middle finger and right breast tumor excision, and removal of multiple tumors up to 2011. No documented stigmata of NF1 or NF2.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for a paternal grandfather with one isolated schwannoma.
